ygData.subject: Re: A tale of woe.
ygData.msgSnippet: There s a gnome on our server, Mauldoon, who has a skill of 172.  He raised his skill up by harvesting the coral mesh from sharks (lvl 20ish) in the OOT.  He
ygData.messageBody:
There's a gnome on our server, Mauldoon, who has a
skill of 172. He raised his skill up by harvesting
the coral mesh from sharks (lvl 20ish) in the OOT. He
never shared the information with anyone. Now the
mobs stopped dropping the items, and he's got a lock
on our market. He also knows the location of diamond
dust, but refuses to tell anyone where it is.

Pretty cool guy, eh? He once told me that he'd tell
me where diamond dust was if I got him twinked to
level 39. Nope, not worth it to me.

So, if you all want to complain about tinkering to
someone, let Mauldoon, from Solusek Ro, know how you
feel. Be forewarned that his ego is about the size of
Long Island. He gets a /rude everytime I see him.

Gazamel Prime
Solusek Ro
50th Gnome Warrior
